sentences: Ta on tehniliselt võimeline seda tegema.
See on tehniliselt võimalik, kuid pole praktiline.
Tehniliselt on see õige, aga mitte praktiline.
context: The word 'tehniliselt' is an adverb in Estonian that means from a technical standpoint or technically, it is used to describe something that is possible or correct from a technical perspective, but may not be practical or feasible in reality.
